LanguageData.Leg.label: leg
LanguageData.Leg.description: Basically long meaty sticks that let you move around.
LanguageData.Foot.label: foot
LanguageData.Foot.description: The thing you can put shoes on.
LanguageData.Arm.label: arm
LanguageData.Arm.description: Arms are like legs, except you can carry stuff with them.
LanguageData.Hand.label: hand
LanguageData.Stomach.label: stomach
LanguageData.Stomach.description: Digests food and turns it into energy and nutrients.
LanguageData.Brain.label: brain
LanguageData.Brain.description: A brain. Someone might miss this.
LanguageData.Spleen.label: селезенка
LanguageData.LobeLiver.label: доля печени
LanguageData.Eye.label: eyeball
LanguageData.Eye.description: Absorbs light, which lets a person know what's around them.
LanguageData.Nose.label: nose
LanguageData.Nose.description: A pretty useful organ to distinguish odors, applies the finishing touch to a face.
LanguageData.Ear.label: ear
LanguageData.Ear.description: Picks up vibrations in the air, allowing people to hear sound.
LanguageData.Jaw.label: jaw
LanguageData.Jaw.description: A nice set of teeth for chewing food and talking.
LanguageData.Finger.label: finger
LanguageData.Toe.label: toe
LanguageData.Ribcage.label: грудная клетка
LanguageData.Spine.label: spine
LanguageData.Spine.description: A spine. Someone may miss this.
LanguageData.Clavicle.label: ключица
LanguageData.Sternum.label: грудная кость
LanguageData.Humerus.label: плечевая кость
LanguageData.Femur.label: бедренная кость
LanguageData.Pelvis.label: таз
LanguageData.Radius.label: радиус
LanguageData.Ulna.label: локтевая кость
LanguageData.Patella.label: коленная чашка
LanguageData.Tibia.label: большеберцовая кость
LanguageData.Fibula.label: малоберцовая кость
